item.description:
I have tickets to Cranmore Mt for January 4th, who wants them?

For those of you who appreciate multiple streams of income that provide monthly residual income, this opportunity for free tickets will be right up your alley! The first 5 people to register and attends for one of the upcoming business overviews listed below, gets a ticket! For you loners, the ticket is good for free entrance for you to Cranmore Mt on Friday, Jan 4th. For those of you with friends and family, your ticket is free and your friends and family who come with you only have to pay $9!

Â 

WHERE: Crowne Plaza - **** This is the new location for Boston AREIA Meetings***
320 Washington St, Boston, MA (Parking is validated)

WHEN: Thu, 11/29 - 7pm....AND
Sat, 12/1 - 9am

Business Overview Meeting w/Multi-Million Dollar Earner, Scott Fardulis is coming to MA!
Scott is a 41 year old self-made multi-millionaire, his focus is coaching people to get more time, more health and more wealth in networking marketing.

Scott says, "I believe network marketing is the BEST method for individuals of all backgrounds to achieve permanent financial freedom in America!"

Thursday November 29th, 2012, 7:00pm - 8:30pm
Youngevity Business Overview Meeting Scott Fardulis

Saturday December 1st 2012 9:00am - 1:00pm
Scott will show you how to create a million dollar business with Youngevity.

Saturday Registration is 8:00am - 9:00am

Please contact Bernadette Trafton at dette101@gmail.com

603-834-4587

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Meet Multi-Million Dollar earner and formulator of ASAP Scott Fardulis
